glsa.title: fish: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in fish, the worst of which could result in local privilege escalation or remote arbitrary code execution.

background.p: fish is the Friendly Interactive SHell.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in fish. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A local attacker may be able to gain escalated privileges or overwrite arbitrary files. Furthermore, a remote attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All fish users should upgrade to the latest version:
